Desc.eng: Hmmrf. You earned the right to pass through. Are you proud?
No, I'm angry! Just because you are the magical embodiment of a colossal landform, it doesn’t give you right to play silly games with anyone!
Umm… We will leave now, thank you.
All the answers were correct. Hmm. You understand us, creatures of the stone. Your gift will be… the true essence of rock itself .
I'm a bit disappointed, though. A hunter like you should've known all the correct answers.
